text: Halberstadt Cl.II was an aircraft of the German Air Force in World War I. On October 25, 1918 a Halberstadt of Reconnaissance Flight 279 was capturedSummary of Air Information 1918 .p.227 ==References== Category:World War I aircraft Category:1917 establishments in Europe Category:1910s establishments in Germany
